i played for a bit and honestly i have no idea where the fall guys comparisons are coming from. the only thing in this game that's even remotely close to fall guys is the "danger zone" game-mode, however its only one round which is kind of annoying. imagine if the finals was the only round in fall guys, wheres the build-up? the lack of multiple rounds just ruins the experience for me, and in all honesty i don't think i will be returning to counter-strike: global offensive.
